data.chText: 愿望；欲望；渴望
data.enText: a strong wish to have or do sth

data.chText: 强烈的权力欲
data.enText: a strong desire for power

data.chText: 足够的钱来满足你所有的欲望
data.enText: enough money to satisfy all your desires

data.chText: 她感到想回家的愿望难以遏制。
data.enText: She felt an overwhelming desire to return home.

data.chText: 我不想再谈此事。
data.enText: I have no desire (= I do not want) to discuss the matter further.

data.chText: 他表示想见见你。
data.enText: He has expressed a desire to see you.

data.chText: 情欲；肉欲；性欲
data.enText: a strong wish to have sex with sb

data.chText: 她对他骤生爱意，欲火攻心。
data.enText: She felt a surge of love and desire for him.

data.chText: 想望的人；渴望的事物
data.enText: a person or thing that is wished for

data.chText: 当她答应嫁给他时，他感到终于得到了自己的心上人。
data.enText: When she agreed to marry him he felt he had achieved his heart's desire .

data.chText: 不用于进行时
data.enText: not used in the progressive tenses

data.chText: 渴望；期望；想望
data.enText: to want sth; to wish for sth

data.chText: 我们都渴望健康和幸福。
data.enText: We all desire health and happiness.

data.chText: 这房子你要什么有什么。
data.enText: The house had everything you could desire.

data.chText: 这种药未达到预期效果。
data.enText: The medicine did not achieve the desired effect .

data.chText: 想住在这个国家北方的人就更少了。
data.enText: Fewer people desire to live in the north of the country.

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+带to的不定式

data.chText: 被（某人）吸引；对（某人）产生性欲
data.enText: to be sexually attracted to sb

data.chText: 他依然对她有欲望。
data.enText: He still desired her.
leave a lot, much, something, etc. to be desired

data.chText: 还有许多（或一些等）需要改进的地方
data.enText: to be bad or unacceptable

ex.chText: 他怀有自己经营公司的雄心壮志。
ex.enText: He has the great ambition of running a company on his own.

ex.chText: 他谋取高位的野心未能得逞。
ex.enText: His ambition of getting a higher position was not achieved.

synonyms.bx: 可用于褒义或贬义，常后接介词 of 或动词不定式。

ex.chText: 他完全不了解他们对未来的抱负。
ex.enText: He knew nothing about their aspirations for the future.

ex.chText: 他渴望赚很多钱。
ex.enText: He has the aspiration to earn a lot of money.

synonyms.bx: 一般用复数，常含褒义，常后接介词 for 或动词不定式。

ex.chText: 她的伙伴们有强烈的获胜欲望。
ex.enText: Her partners have a strong desire to win.

ex.chText: 他们对知识的渴望深深地打动了那位老师。
ex.enText: The teacher was deeply touched by their desire for knowledge.

ex.chText: 他希望能葬在家乡。
ex.enText: It was his desire that he should be buried in his hometown.

synonyms.bx: 一般指有强烈的目的和意图，常后接动词不定式、介词 for 以及 that 从句。

ex.chText: 她渴望得到他的爱。
ex.enText: She yearned for his love.

ex.chText: 他渴望回到故乡。
ex.enText: He yearned to go back to his hometown.

synonyms.bx: 尤指渴望得到很难得到的事物，或做难以如愿之事，常伴有些许不安或痛苦。

ex.chText: 许多孩子渴望得到关心。
ex.enText: Many children crave attention.

ex.chText: 琳达仍然渴望得到同龄人的认可。
ex.enText: Linda still craves the recognition of her peers.

ex.chText: 他很想抽烟。
ex.enText: He was craving cigarettes.

synonyms.bx: 指非常强烈、几乎无法控制地渴望某事物，有时甚至是不好的事物。

ex.chText: 我们都渴望幸福和健康。
ex.enText: We all desire happiness and health.

ex.chText: 我们总是渴望与邻居和睦相处。
ex.enText: We always desire to live in peace with our neighbours.

ex.chText: 她渴望嫁给他。
ex.enText: She desires to marry him.

synonyms.bx: 强调主观愿望上热切渴望某事物，多指可以达成的事情，常含尽力争取的意味，不用进行时。

ex.chText: 我渴望有一天能够梦想成真。
ex.enText: I long for the day when my dream can come true.

ex.chText: 这就是你一直所渴求的东西？
ex.enText: So this is what you've been longing for?

ex.chText: 我们渴望见到你。
ex.enText: We are longing to see you.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，尤指渴望看似不会很快发生的事发生，常后接介词 for 或动词不定式。

ex.chText: 约翰渴望回到美国的故乡。
ex.enText: John was pining for his homeland back in America.

ex.chText: 她渴望乡间的生活。
ex.enText: She pined for the countryside.

synonyms.bx: 尤指渴望得到不太可能得到的事物，含苦苦思念之意。

data.enText: leave a lot, much, something, etc. to be desired

data.chText: 还有许多（或一些等）需要改进的地方
data.enText: to be bad or unacceptable

tr: the feeling that accompanies an unsatisfied state
feel or have a desire for
example: I want to go home now
I trust you will behave better from now on
I hope she understands that she cannot expect a raise

value.def: A desire is a strong wish to do or have something.

example.ex: I had a strong desire to help and care for people...
example.tran: 我非常渴望能够帮助和照顾他人。

example.ex: They seem to have lost their desire for life.
example.tran: 他们似乎已丧失了对生活的热望。

value.def: If you desire something, you want it.

example.ex: She had remarried and desired a child with her new husband...
example.tran: 她又结婚了，并且渴望和新任丈夫生个小孩。

example.ex: But Fred was bored and desired to go home...
example.tran: 但弗雷德觉得很无聊，想要回家。

example.ex: He desired me to inform her that he had made his peace with God.
example.tran: 他想让我告诉她他已接受了上天的安排，获得了心灵的安宁。

example.ex: You may find that just threatening this course of action will produce the desired effect...
example.tran: 你会发现只要威胁说将会采取这一行动就能取得预期的效果。

example.ex: His warnings have provoked the desired response.
example.tran: 他的警告引起了预想的反应。

value.def: Desire for someone is a strong feeling of wanting to have sex with them.

example.ex: Teenage sex, for instance, may come not out of genuine desire but from a need to get love.
example.tran: 例如，青少年的性行为可能并不是源于真正的情欲，而是出于一种对爱的需要。

value.def: If you desire someone, you want to have sex with them.

example.ex: It never occurred to him that she might not desire him.
example.tran: 他从没有想过她可能不想跟他上床。

value.def: If desired is used in instructions in written English to indicate that someone can choose to take the course of action mentioned.

example.ex: Additional courses may be taken if desired...
example.tran: 如有需要可选修额外的课程。

example.ex: Transfer this sauce to a separate saucepan, if desired.
example.tran: 如果愿意的话，可以把这些调味汁倒入一只单独的长柄锅里。

value.tran: （用于说明性的书面语中）如果需要的话,如果愿意的话

value.def: If you say that someone or something is your heart's desire, you mean that you want that person or thing very much.

example.ex: He was extremely devious in his efforts to achieve his heart's desire.
example.tran: 他在设法得到自己的中意之物时会不择手段。

value.tran: 心里想望之人;心中渴望之物

value.def: If you say that something leaves a lot to be desired, you mean that it is not as good as it should be.

example.ex: The selection of TV programmes, especially at the weekend, leaves a lot to be desired...
example.tran: 可供选择的电视节目，尤其是在周末的时候，还有大幅提升的空间。

example.ex: Food seems to have been available, even if the quality left much to be desired...
example.tran: 食品似乎能够买到了，虽然质量还远不尽如人意。

example.ex: It is just possible that the accuracy of the information provided might leave something to be desired.
example.tran: 很有可能所提供信息的准确性还不够高。

value.tran: 尚有（许多）需要改进之处;有待（大幅）提高
